Text:
this is full game?
only multiplayer?

It is the full game with Singleplayer and Multiplayer support.
And darth_tater, this is not spam, it's serious. I play it all the time with my friends over the internet, but you need Kali for On-line support. And there is no need to pay for anything.
Can some-one upload emperor battle for dune plz.
Emperor Battle? is that an add-on or something?

Emperor: Battle For Dune is the next game in the series.

And this torrent is probably a movie rip. Maybe music too.

If this works, i'm gonna have one happy girlfriend ;)

cheers, keep the sharing.

Dune 2000 is awesome. Thanks. Also, I would think that you can get around using Kali... 
I can't remember if Dune 2000 supports it, but if you can use Local Area Network, you can use the program Hamachi, which you can get here: http://www.hamachi.cc/

It's totally sweet, and works with any game that supports LAN. Great way to avoid using Battle.net for Blizzard games as well. ;-)
YEah, I tried Hamachi but it won't work for us... maybe you know some settings we need to set?
It is the complete game, with multi-player AND single-player. Only the video's between missions are not in.
Reseed plz thank you!

seed please i love the game
How do i play the game ? i already installed kali and i downloaded dune 200 what do i do next?

scanned with AVG 8.0.100

found virus in Dune2000.exe:

Trojan horse Generic10.AKCL

otherwise great game. And I actually played it for a couple weeks before discovering this :(

I think it is just the coding that is in the DUNE2000.EXE that AVG sees as a threat.  I have tried every image and version of the game and AVG sees it every time.  I do not think that every image would have the same virus

I agree zero. Yet, even after disabling my AVG, assuming it was a false positive, I then get this error window when attempting to launch the executable (DUNE200.exe):

Windows cannot access the specified device, path, or file. You may not have the appropriate permissions to access the item. 

Using a legit Windows XP Pro, SP3. And I am positive that I am logged in as admin.

What gives?

I used to have this game --  there is NO trial version -- but when I got my new pc and vista the screen was messed up (check this http://forum.dune2k.com/index.php?topic=15837.0 just in case) I also knew a person who created a portable and has made many breakthroughs in the game, by the name of Gruntlord6. For his files: http://dune.gruntmods.com/
Thank you so much. Works perfectly. Ive been looking for a real version of this everywhere.
